title: Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: plain compound twill with brocading (?)
description: Striped textile with details in silver. Four repeated motifs within the stripes include Indian palm motif flowers and arabesques. Dark blue, green, pink and tan.
